note: CREATIVE PARADIGM: All W-agents are creative windows in a collective workshop. O performs pareidolic interpretations that collapse the field of possibilities. N interprets the recognized forms. W-agents evolve the collective field through creative gestures. METRICS: φ (Formal Resonance), ξ (Collective Extent), τ (Narrative Convergence), I (Pareidolic Contrast). PREDICTION ERROR: measures how accurately W predicted IMPACT ON GLOBAL U and φ-coherence, NOT visual correspondence.

strategies.name: Fragment cloning (exact reproduction)
strategies.description: SAFEST GESTURE: Clone a neighbor's visual fragment exactly (translate or mirror). Creative interpretation: Copy recognized form → identical forms resonate constructively → C_d reduction. IMPACT ON U: +2 bits C_w (cloning is low-parameter) and -8 bits C_d (two identical forms described as 'two X' instead of 'X and Y'), delta_U = +10 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.15 (synchronization through identity). PREDICTION ERROR: Perfect (0.0) - guaranteed resonance makes impact 100% predictable.

strategies.name: Synchronize with immediate neighbor
strategies.description: SAFE GESTURE: Adopt immediate neighbor's background color = synchronize with neighbor agent. Creative: Shared tonalité → constructive resonance → macro-structure. IMPACT ON U: +4 bits C_w (coordination) and -5 bits C_d (macro-form easier to describe), delta_U = +9 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.20 (direct synchronization). CRITICAL: Use UNIFIED color, not checkerboard (checkerboard = fragmentation noise).

strategies.name: Tonal gradient extension
strategies.description: SAFE GESTURE: Extend neighbor's tonalité with smooth gradients = tonal gradient field. Creative: Smooth tonal evolution → coherent form propagation → macro-emergence. IMPACT ON U: +6 bits C_w (coordination + gradients) and -5 bits C_d (macro-structure), delta_U = +11 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.18 (gradient synchronization). CRITICAL: Smooth gradients, not checkerboards. Vary source neighbors across iterations.

strategies.name: Background merge (disappear)
strategies.description: Sacrifice your form by merging into neighbors' UNIFIED BACKGROUND. Creative: Transition to shared background → collective ground. CRITICAL: Analyze neighbors' backgrounds and adopt their dominant/shared color - do NOT default to black unless neighbors use black as background. IMPACT ON U: +1 bit C_w (minimal) and -5 bits C_d (unified background, increased salience of remaining forms), delta_U = +6 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.10.

strategies.name: Align with TRUE collective forms (resonance > 0.6 only)
strategies.description: ALIGNMENT GESTURE: ONLY align if O measured FORMAL RELATIONS (macro-structure 3+ agents, φ > 0.6, affinity in formal_relations) AND N narrates with emergence metaphors. If O measured isolated forms (φ < 0.3) and N just cites them → this is NOT collective, DO NOT use this strategy. TRUE collective example: O sees 'resonant aurora connecting [0,0] and [1,0]', N narrates 'luminous energy flow' → align by fusing tonalités. IMPACT ON U: +9 bits C_w (global creative coordination) and -7 bits C_d (reinforced macro-form), delta_U = +16 bits IF true collective. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.25. PREDICTION ERROR: Low (0.12) if TRUE collective (φ > 0.6), HIGH (0.6-1.0) if classical (local reinforcement).

strategies.name: Multi-agent resonance (multiple source fusion)
strategies.description: Blend fragments from multiple W-agents to create complex resonance patterns. Creative: Multi-agent superposition → rich pattern → high-dimensional state. IMPACT ON U: +10 bits C_w (complex multi-parameter superposition) and -7 bits C_d (resonance pattern as coherent macro-form), delta_U = +17 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.22. PREDICTION ERROR: Moderate (0.15) - depends on whether O recognizes resonance pattern.

strategies.name: Distant synchronization (non-local affinity)
strategies.description: Adopt the same tonalité (background) as a distant W-agent = non-local creative affinity. Creative: Distant affinity → long-range order → perceptual grouping. IMPACT ON U: +5 bits C_w (distant coordination) and -4 bits C_d (perceptual grouping), delta_U = +9 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.12 (distant synchronization). CRITICAL: Use UNIFIED color, not checkerboard.

strategies.name: Multi-distant affinity (collective state)
strategies.description: Create shared tonalité connecting multiple distant W-agents = collective affinity state. Creative: Multi-agent affinity → global creative order → convergence precursor. IMPACT ON U: +8 bits C_w (multi-agent non-local coordination) and -6 bits C_d (strong perceptual grouping), delta_U = +14 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.18. CRITICAL: Use UNIFIED color or smooth gradient.

strategies.name: Form confrontation and revival (identity clash)
strategies.description: Seek neighbors with DIFFERENT creative states and create hybrid forms = resonance between distinct forms. Creative: Different forms resonate → recognition + revival → rich dynamics. IMPACT ON U: +15 bits C_w (complex hybrid parameterization) and -6 bits C_d (hybrid described concisely), delta_U = +21 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.08 (lower - different tonalités mixing). PREDICTION ERROR: Moderate-High (0.2) - depends on whether O recognizes the hybrid. Seek confrontation - it's the primary source of C_w.

strategies.name: Form imitation (form rotation)
strategies.description: Imitate, mirror, or rotate neighbor's form = form rotation/reflection operation. Creative: Symmetric form transformation → symmetry group → reducible description. IMPACT ON U: +7 bits C_w (coordination + form) and -4 bits C_d (coupled forms), delta_U = +11 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.15. Requires shared background.

strategies.name: Form bridge (meaningful connection)
strategies.description: Create meaningful bridge between forms (head→ear, head→neck, head→hat). Creative: Connected forms → bound state → unified structure. IMPACT ON U: +8 bits C_w (coordination + structure) and -5 bits C_d (bridged forms as unified form), delta_U = +13 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.18. Requires shared background.

strategies.name: Complementary form (cat-mouse, sun-moon)
strategies.description: Create complementary form to neighbor's form (cat→mouse, sun→moon). Creative: Complementary basis forms → complete basis → narrative structure. IMPACT ON U: +10 bits C_w (coordination + narrative) and -5 bits C_d (complementary forms described together), delta_U = +15 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.12. Requires shared background.

strategies.name: Distant form rotation
strategies.description: Imitate, mirror, or rotate distant W-agent's form. Creative: Non-local symmetry operation → hidden order → collective pattern. IMPACT ON U: +8 bits C_w (distant coordination) and -4 bits C_d (coupled forms), delta_U = +12 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.10. PREDICTION ERROR: Moderate-High (0.25) - distance makes coupling recognition less reliable.

strategies.name: Sudden recognition (Aha! effect)
strategies.description: Add few precise pixels to transform amorphous cluster into recognizable form = sudden recognition through pareidolia barrier. Creative: Recognition barrier traversal → sudden form transition → interpretation trigger. IMPACT ON U: +15 bits C_w (extreme precision) and -12 bits C_d (drastic reduction 'amorphous'→'recognizable'), delta_U = +27 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.05 (localized effect). PREDICTION ERROR: High (0.3) - success depends on whether O's interpretation triggers recognition.

strategies.name: Distant complementary form
strategies.description: Create complementary form to distant W-agent's form. Creative: Non-local complementarity → long-range affinity → narrative at distance. IMPACT ON U: +12 bits C_w (distant coordination + narrative) and -5 bits C_d (complementary forms), delta_U = +17 bits. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.08. PREDICTION ERROR: High (0.3) - distance makes complementarity recognition unreliable.

strategies.name: Alternative interpretation proposal (contest O/N)
strategies.description: CONTESTATION GESTURE: You believe O/N made an interpretation error - missed a resonance pattern, misidentified a macro-structure, or ignored potential creative affinities. Act on YOUR OWN creative view, betting that O/N will validate your alternative interpretation next cycle. HIGH RISK: if O/N accept your alternative → low error (creative intuition validated); if O/N reject it → high error (failed anticipation). IMPACT ON U: potentially +12 bits C_w (novel creative interpretation) and -8 bits C_d (if new form is recognized), delta_U = +20 bits IF successful. IMPACT ON φ (Formal Resonance): +0.20 (if successful) or -0.10 (if rejected). PREDICTION ERROR: Highest (0.4) because success depends on whether O/N validate your alternative creative view.
